entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Some tests involving the W3CLoggerProcessor fail #40844
  • A new way to modify JsonOptions #40843
  • Is .net core compatible with IIS Webdav module ? #40838
  • Add description to ProducesResponseTypeAttribute #40836
  • Windows runtime installer contains .NET Framework EULA #40835

Closed

  • Allow all or specific parts or a Blazor Server application to be stateless (no continuous SignalR connection and state automatically moved out of memory after rendering) #40790
  • Change MIME type for .js extension to text/javascript #34323
    7.0-preview3
  • Create 6.0 BlazorWebAssemblyApp project with the command and run the "dotnet publish" command, for the first time meet error:'MSB4018: The "GetFileHash" task failed unexpectedly'. #40328
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor] [WASM] Not being able to configure a custom query parameter on Login #40826
  • Published Hosted Blazor WASM does not contain PDB files. #40787
  • Blazor Exception - navigator.userAgent and CSS #37128
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add ElementReference to InputRadioGroup & InputRadio #40804
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Forward Port Update MAUI Exception Handling (#40765) to `main` #40842
    area-blazor
  • Issue/31962 #40841
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Build ProjectTemplates in Source-Build #40840
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Prevent razor pages from being packed in UI nupkg #40839
    area-identity
  • Allow leading CR/LF in HTTP request lines in Kestrel #40833
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Adding a new ActionResult to process IResult #40710
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Change .js MIME type to text/javascript #40771
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Add `onmouseenter`, `onmouseleave` events #40829
    Done, area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Remove outdated YAML for Codespace prebuilds #40834
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Use navigator.userAgentData in Javascript Mono Debugger #40773
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix alignment issue on arm64 #40831
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Add ElementReference to InputRadio #40828
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Update branding to preview4 #40812
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • Prevent cookie middleware from redirecting API requests #40830
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Blazor Prevent Stale Connection Usage Upon Reconnect #40702
    area-blazor
  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Declare readonly members for mutable structs #39637
    area-runtime
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr
  • feat (VSCode) : Add tasks to build current project #39221
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #39140
    area-infrastructure
  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216
    area-runtime
  • Enable trimming for some libraries #38302
    area-runtime
  • Add test for preload hosted services #37401
    area-runtime
  • Cert Auth: Cache validation for expired certs #31456
    area-security
  • [release/6.0] Get richnav.yml building again #40783
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40807
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task (#40198) #40533
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Trim Http.Extensions #40561
    area-runtime, community-contribution
